title: Cursed Dart
summaries: The Cursed Dart is a type of Hardmode dart used with the Blowgun, Blowpipe, Dart Pistol, and the Dart Rifle. When fired, small flame projectiles called "Cursed Dart Flame" drip from the dart as it flies, each dealing 80% base damage and 50% knockback of the Cursed Dart. The flames fall straight downwards and land on solid blocks, lingering for 2 seconds before disappearing. The flames can pierce up to 2 targets, hitting a total of 3 targets. The falling flames and the darts themselves inflict the Cursed Inferno debuff on enemies for 3â€“6 seconds. The dripping cursed flame ability makes it effective for fighting large numbers of enemies or multi-part enemies. It is the Corruption's counterpart to the Crimson's Ichor Dart.

statistics.Tooltip: Drops cursed flames on the ground
statistics.Sell: 6 CC
